result.markdown:
# 디지털 전환 지표
ㄴ 전통 지표 ## 전통적 지표

![](img/public/esg-country-classic.png) ::: aside - [위키백과 OECD](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OECD) ::: ## 전통 지표 기준 강대국 {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'tibble' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'dplyr' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ── ✔ dplyr 1.1.2 ✔ readr 2.1.4 ✔ forcats 1.0.0 ✔ stringr 1.5.0 ✔ ggplot2 3.4.2 ✔ tibble 3.2.1 ✔ lubridate 1.9.2 ✔ tidyr 1.3.0 ✔ purrr 1.0.1 ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ℹ Use the conflicted package () to force all conflicts to become errors ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(countrycode) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'countrycode' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(reactable) library(htmltools) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'htmltools' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_full_df <- read_rds(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/oecd_full_df.rds")) oecd_df <- oecd_full_df %>% select(country, flags, -ends_with("rank"), everything()) %>% mutate(iso2c = countrycode(iso3c, origin = "iso3c", destination = "iso2c") %>% str_to_lower(.)) %>% mutate(gdp = round(gdp/10^9, 0), population = round(population / 10^6, 0)) oecd_df %>% select("country", "flags", "gdp", "area", "population", "gdp_per_capita") %>% arrange(desc(gdp)) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 5, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( width = 200, html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), gdp = colDef( width = 100, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), area = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), gdp_per_capita = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## 확장 전통 지표

![](img/public/esg-country-extension.png) ::: aside - [위키백과 OECD](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OECD) ::: ## 확장 지표 기준 선진국 {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_df %>% select("country", "flags", "income_inequality", "hdi", "fsi", "cpi", "ief", "gpi", "wpfi", "di") %>% arrange(income_inequality) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 5, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( width = 170, html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE, digits = 1), width = 70 ), income_inequality = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE, digits = 1), width = 110 ), hdi = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE, digits = 1), width = 80 ), fsi = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE, digits = 1), width = 80 ), cpi = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE, digits = 1), width = 80 ), ief = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE, digits = 1), width = 80 ), gpi = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE, digits = 1), width = 80 ), wpfi = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE, digits = 1), width = 80 ), di = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE, digits = 1), width = 80 ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: # 디지털 전환 지표
ㄴ 디지털 지표 ## 디지털 강대국 지표 {.smaller} ![](img/public/oecd-dataset.png) - [디지털 정부 순위](https://www.oecd-ilibrary.org/deliver/4de9f5bb-en.pdf?itemId=%2Fcontent%2Fpaper%2F4de9f5bb-en&mimeType=pdf) - [정부 인공지능 준비지수](https://www.oxfordinsights.com/government-ai-readiness-index-2020) - [데이터 경제 순위](https://hbr.org/2019/01/which-countries-are-leading-the-data-economy) - [산업용 로봇 밀도](https://ifr.org/downloads/press2018/Robot_Density_by_country_WorldRobotics2020_graph.jpg) - [세계 경쟁력 보고서](https://reports.weforum.org/global-competitiveness-report-2019/competitiveness-rankings/) - [IMD 세계 경쟁력 연감](https://www.imd.org/wcc/world-competitiveness-center-rankings/world-digital-competitiveness-rankings-2020/) ## 디지털 강대국 지표 - 디지털 정부 순위 {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(reactable) library(htmltools) library(countrycode) oecd_full_df <- read_rds(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/oecd_full_df.rds")) oecd_df <- oecd_full_df %>% select(country, flags, -ends_with("rank"), everything()) %>% mutate(iso2c = countrycode(iso3c, origin = "iso3c", destination = "iso2c") %>% str_to_lower(.)) %>% mutate(gdp = round(gdp/10^9, 0), population = round(population / 10^6, 0)) oecd_df %>% arrange(gov_rank) %>% select(country, flags, 디지털정부 = gov_rank, gdp, gdp_per_capita) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), gdp = colDef( width = 100, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), gdp_per_capita = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), 디지털정부 = colDef( align = "center", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## 디지털 강대국 지표 - 인공지능 준비지수 {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_df %>% arrange(ai_rank) %>% select(country, flags, AI_순위 = ai_rank, gdp, gdp_per_capita) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), gdp = colDef( width = 100, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), gdp_per_capita = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), AI_순위 = colDef( align = "center", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## 디지털 강대국 지표 - 데이터 경제 {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_df %>% arrange(ai_rank) %>% select(country, flags, 데이터경제 = data_rank, gdp, gdp_per_capita) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), gdp = colDef( width = 100, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), gdp_per_capita = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), 데이터경제 = colDef( align = "center", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## 디지털 강대국 지표 - 산업용 로봇 {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_df %>% arrange(robot_rank) %>% select(country, flags, 로봇_순위 = robot_rank, gdp, gdp_per_capita) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), gdp = colDef( width = 100, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), gdp_per_capita = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), 로봇_순위 = colDef( align = "center", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## 디지털 강대국 지표 - WEF 세계 경쟁력 {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_df %>% arrange(wef_rank) %>% select(country, flags, WEF_순위 = wef_rank, gdp, gdp_per_capita) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), gdp = colDef( width = 100, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), gdp_per_capita = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), WEF_순위 = colDef( align = "center", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## 디지털 강대국 지표 - IMD 디지털 경쟁력 {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_df %>% arrange(digital_rank) %>% select(country, flags, IMD_순위 = digital_rank, gdp, gdp_per_capita) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), gdp = colDef( width = 100, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), gdp_per_capita = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), IMD_순위 = colDef( align = "center", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## 디지털 강대국 지표 - 종합 {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_df %>% arrange(robot_rank) %>% select(country, flags, 정부 = gov_rank, AI = ai_rank, 데이터경제 = data_rank, 로봇 = robot_rank, WEF = wef_rank, IMD = digital_rank) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( width = 170, html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), 정부 = colDef( width = 70, align = "center" ), AI = colDef( width = 70, align = "center" ), 로봇 = colDef( width = 70, align = "center" ), WEF = colDef( width = 70, align = "center" ), IMD = colDef( width = 70, align = "center" ), 데이터경제 = colDef( align = "center", width = 125, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## 디지털 강대국 지표 - 종합 시각화 {.smaller} ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} library(plotly) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'plotly' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Attaching package: 'plotly' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following object is masked from 'package:ggplot2': last_plot ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following object is masked from 'package:stats': filter ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following object is masked from 'package:graphics': layout ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidymodels) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'tidymodels' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────── tidymodels 1.1.0 ── ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ✔ broom 1.0.5 ✔ rsample 1.1.1 ✔ dials 1.2.0 ✔ tune 1.1.1 ✔ infer 1.0.4 ✔ workflows 1.1.3 ✔ modeldata 1.2.0 ✔ workflowsets 1.0.1 ✔ parsnip 1.1.0 ✔ yardstick 1.2.0 ✔ recipes 1.0.6 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'broom' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'dials' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'parsnip' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'recipes' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'tune' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'workflowsets' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'yardstick' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ── Conflicts ───────────────────────────────────────── tidymodels_conflicts() ── ✖ scales::discard() masks purrr::discard() ✖ plotly::filter() masks dplyr::filter(), stats::filter() ✖ recipes::fixed() masks stringr::fixed() ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ✖ yardstick::spec() masks readr::spec() ✖ recipes::step() masks stats::step() • Learn how to get started at https://www.tidymodels.org/start/ ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(embed) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'embed' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_model_df <- oecd_df %>% select(-gov_rank, -robot_rank) recipe_spec <- oecd_model_df %>% na.omit() %>% select(country, gdp, population, gdp_per_capita, contains("rank")) %>% recipe( ~ .) %>% update_role(country, new_role = "id") %>% step_normalize(all_predictors()) %>% step_umap(all_numeric(), num_comp = 2, seed = c(777, 987)) umap_tbl <- recipe_spec %>% prep() %>% juice() # 툴팁 데이터 작성 plot_tbl <- umap_tbl %>% inner_join( oecd_model_df %>% select(country, contains("rank")) ) %>% mutate(tooltip = str_glue( " Country: {country} WEF Rank: {wef_rank} IMD Rank: {digital_rank} AI Rank: {ai_rank} 데이터경제 Rank: {data_rank} " )) %>% mutate(club_3050 = ifelse(str_detect(country, "United States|Korea|Japan|United Kingdom|France|Germany|Italy"), "30-50 클럽","기타") ) %>% mutate(club_3050 = factor(club_3050, levels = c("30-50 클럽","기타"))) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Joining with `by = join_by(country)` ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # mutate(class = case_when(str_detect(country, "United States") ~ "United States", # str_detect(country, "Korea") ~ "Korea", # str_detect(country, "Japan") ~ "Japan", # str_detect(country, "Germany") ~ "Germany", # TRUE ~ "기타")) %>% # mutate(class = factor(class, levels=c("Korea", "United States", "Japan", "Germany", "기타"))) # Plotly 시각화 ---- plot_tbl %>% janitor::clean_names() %>% plot_ly(x = ~ umap1, y = ~ umap2, color = ~ club_3050, colors = c('red', 'darkgray'), hovertemplate = ~ tooltip) %>% add_markers(opacity = 1) %>% add_text(text = ~country, showlegend = FALSE, textposition = "top right") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
